sentences.text: Mingae dapa tsu va andeni singo a'ija canse'fa.
Tayopi fae tsandie tsu an'bian tise du'shuma.

values.value: Long ago, a man had a boy.

sentences.text: Tsa du'shu tsu tise yaya cundyiye japa cundyi'je'choma atte.
Tsonsi tsama attepa yaya que cundyi'fa tsu sin'an qquen susi tise yaya in'jan, cuintsu tsa'caen injengembe camba tisu yaya cundyi'je'fama atte'ta singo a'ive daye.
Tsa'caen in'jansi tsa du'shuja singove da.
Tsa'caen singove dapa jai'ngae pushepa singove atapa.
Tsa'ye tsu ja'o pan singondeccuja va andeni canse'fa.
